fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
- You may place a bet on either somebody’s survival or somebody’s death each day
- If Survival bet, the target will be granted a powerful defense the following night, if death bet you will deal a powerful attack to your target the following night
- With each successful bet you will get 1  coin, you may gift one coin to a random evil role in the game every day
- 1 coin can be traded for a basic attack on a target of the trader’s choice, once traded the coins will return to you and become unusable
- Should you be the only remaining evil in the game you can use the attacks yourself

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: You win when Town doesn’t win
